lessonTitle: If-Then Logic with the CASE Statement
lessonDescription: [WIP] The closest a SQL SELECT query has to if-then logic is the CASE statement, and even then it's not entirely used the way you'd think it'd be. We'll dive into CASE and its usefulness here.
